Sentencas: A novel SOFC system control strategy has been developed for rapid load following.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide fuel cell system controller for rapid load following

Sentencas: The strategy was motivated from the performance of a baseline control strategy developed from control concepts in the literature.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide fuel cell system controller for rapid load following

Sentencas: The basis for the fuel cell system control concepts are explained by a simplified order of magnitude time scale analysis.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide fuel cell system controller for rapid load following

Sentencas: The control concepts are then investigated in a detailed quasi-two-dimensional integrated dynamic system model that resolves the physics of heat transfer, chemical kinetics, mass convection and electrochemistry within the system.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide fuel cell system controller for rapid load following

Sentencas: The baseline control strategy is based on the standard operating method of constant utilization with no control of the combustor temperature.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide fuel cell system controller for rapid load following

Sentencas: Simulation indicates that with this control strategy large combustor transients can take place during load transients because the fuel flow to the combustor increases faster than the air flow.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide fuel cell system controller for rapid load following

Sentencas: To alleviate this problem, a novel control structure that maintains the combustor temperature within acceptable ranges without any supplementary hardware was introduced.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide fuel cell system controller for rapid load following

Sentencas: The combustor temperature is controlled by manipulating the current to change the combustor inlet stoichiometry.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide fuel cell system controller for rapid load following

Sentencas: The load following capability of SOFC systems is inherently limited by anode compartment fuel depletion during the time of fuel delivery delay.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide fuel cell system controller for rapid load following

Sentencas: This research indicates that future SOFC systems with proper system and control configurations can exhibit excellent load following characteristics.
Titulo: Novel solid oxide fuel cell system controller for rapid load following
